notes: Recently renovated apartment in excellent condition with modern wood-look flooring, track lighting, built-in cabinetry with media unit, split AC units, and a fully updated bathroom with glass shower partition and modern fixtures. The open-plan layout is spacious at ~65 sqm with good natural light from large sliding glass balcony doors and side windows. For baby safety, the balcony has floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors that can be kept locked, the bathroom glass shower enclosure has a low threshold to watch for, and the built-in cabinet has some open shelving with sharp corners that may need padding; overall the unit is unfurnished and clean with no major red flags.
